descriptionHtml:
A small side project i made on request by Nastyman_Nilsen.

[url=https://skfb.ly/OpTz]Sketchfab 3D Model Viewer
[/url]

My other mod:Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73990/?]Shield of the Forgotten Jarl[/url]


[About me]

Really, people read this? Okay then here we go....
My name is Alkarath a noob-ish mod developer... or somthing like that.
I started modding begin 2016 with no prior knowledge, and taught myself most of modding by failing miseribly countless of times, watching tutorials and bothering experienced modders with questions.
This is my second mod and like i said it is of lower quality than what i am capable of doing.


[About the Mod]

I finished this project within one day, granted i invested in multiple new programs to make mods i'd figure it would not be that bad of an idea to practice a bit. So killing 2 birds with one stone, (Not really i'd never do that... those poor birds) i decided to make a requested shield.
The shield can be crafted at any forge with dwarven smithing.


[Dwarven Spiked Shield]

Value: 150
Type: Light
Weight: 3.0
Armor: 15
Recipe:
Steel ingots: 2
Leather strips: 5
Temper:
Steel Ingot: 1


If you want me to make a slightly bigger version and/or one with better stats tell me in the comments, as right now the stats and size are based upon the requested ones.


[Programs used]

3dsMax 2015
Quixel suite 2
Photoshop CC 2015
Nifskope


Hope you enjoy!
author: Alkarath
